About Me

Let me tell you a few things .....

BIO

A senior UX design professional with significant User Experience (UX) and User Interaction design expertise for web-based enterprise applications. Demonstrated technical leadership of projects and features for web-based Enterprise application and proven ability to optimize User experience for Telecommunication, Healthcare, Healthcare Reform and ICD-10 mapping domains. Skilled at ensuring that products adhere to the company branding. Bi-lingual, doctoral level educated with strong analytical, communication, organizational, and interpersonal skills who has achieved successful outcomes working with both domestic and international teams.

Ericsson

Senior UX Designer 2014-2018

Senior UX designer of a global large Agile team and across many functional teams delivering customer features for production Cloud Management software. Defined low/ high fidelity mockups and designs, User Stories, GUI requirements definition in support of new product features. Maintained and prioritized User Stories backlogs based on business needs and played a role in the sprint planning, development, QA, and documentation to ensure successful product releases and customer adoption for the new features.

OPTUM (united Health Care)

Senior UX Designer 2007-2014

Senior UX Designer and Subject Matter expert for Building and designing software to produce Medical insurance plans for Small businesses. Designed web pages for multiple medical websites owned by OPTUM. Created wire frames, Requirement Definitions and built prototypes as proof of concept. Updated and tested existing OPTUM medical websites. Lead the design for Small Businesses health insurance plans.

Raritan Valley Community College

Professor Business School - 2004-2007

  • Web development and Cascade Style Sheets (CSS).
  • Computing for business.
  • Data structures Data modeling and analysis
